main event: On August 7, 1968, Mr. John Doe observed an unidentified flying object in the sky over Ottsville, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The object was round, approximately 50 feet in diameter, and hovered silently at 500 feet altitude., It was illuminated from within and emitted a pulsating light., The sighting lasted 3-4 minutes before the object accelerated rapidly and disappeared., The case was part of the U.S. Air Force's Project Blue Book investigations., No further conclusions were provided in the report.
